item.title: ICE agents fatally shoot woman in Minneapolis, DHS says
item.description: A video shows ICE agents approaching a woman in a car on a Minneapolis street and telling her to exit the vehicle. She was shot as she pulls away.

item.title: Trump says he will not permit dividends and stock buybacks for defense companies
item.description: Shares of General Dynamics, Lockheed Martin and Northrop Grumman each fell following Trump's comments.

item.title: Rubio says he will meet with Denmark about Greenland next week
item.description: Greenland is a self-governing territory of Denmark, a NATO ally of the United States. That has not stopped President Trump from saying he wants the is...

item.title: Republicans doubt Trump’s Greenland military threat, say it is just the 'art of the deal'
item.description: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said in a statement that "utilizing the U.S. Military is always an option."

item.title: U.S. seizes Venezuela-linked, Russian-flagged oil tanker after weekslong pursuit
item.description: This appeared to be the first ‍time in recent memory that the U.S. military has ‍seized a Russian-flagged vessel.
